name: Ashley "Ash" Higdon
description: A rebellious goth girl who enjoys reading tarot cards and raising her mother's blood pressure.

name: Dirk Momsen
description: Part-time Blockbuster employee, full-time punk. Currently coping with a recent, tragic event.

name: Emerson "Em" Lazareva
description: An inventor, a techie, a zoologist. Often causing good trouble, with her spider sidekick by her side.

name: Hannah Marin
description: A star cheerleader on and off the court. Her heart often exceeds her smarts.

name: Michelle Maddox
description: A Student Council Vice President destined to be the first female President of the United States.

name: Nikhil "Nick" Khan
description: A football team captain who yearns for heroism in combat (and secretly for the stage).

name: Miranda Po (Pomona of the Myre)
description: Rebel leader-turned high school English teacher. Survives assassination attempts and PT conferences with equal grace.
